Importing from iTunes will import your m: Importing from iTunes will import your music playlists. It will also import your ratings, the date you added the music, and play and skip counts for tracks in your library.
Please check that this file exists and t: Molimo provjerite da taj dokument postoji i da je potreban disk učitan.
This feature requires a Plex Pass subscr: Ova mogućnost zahtjeva Plex Pass pretplatu.
Everything you need to experience the be: Everything you need to experience the best of Plex. Your subscription gives you premium features and exclusive access to new ones.
{1}Sign in{2} to a Plex account with a P: {1}Sign in{2} to a Plex account with a Plex Pass subscription.
Some cloud storage providers limit file: Some cloud storage providers limit file size or upload time, If you have trouble, try reducing your quality setting. Cloud Sync content will not be available until all items are converted and uploaded.
A large number of sync items may be time: A large number of sync items may be time-consuming to convert, and the time to upload is dependent on your bandwidth. A large number of high quality items may take a very long time. If you have trouble, try reducing the number of items or your quality setting.
A large number of sync items may be time-consuming to convert and transfer to your device. If you have trouble, try reducing the number of items.

Restrict TV shows to any of the filters: Restrict TV shows to any of the filters below.
We were unable to retrieve libraries for: We were unable to retrieve libraries for {1}. Please ensure the server is signed in to your Plex account.
Adding a Plex user to your home will all: Adding a Plex user to your home will allow you to quickly switch accounts. The invited user will be asked to confirm home membership.
Managed users are only available when si: Managed users are only available when signed in with an account in your home. You can choose any name you like and you'll be able to set restrictions on accessible media.
The invited user will be asked to confir: The invited user will be asked to confirm friendship. If libraries are shared with the user, you'll be able to set restrictions on accessible media.
{1}, so we've made a few changes to help: {1}, so we've made a few changes to help keep your media safe.
We've increased the security requirement: Povećali smo sigurnosne zahjteve za ovaj poslužitelj tako da će sve što komunicira sa njim trebati biti prijavljen na Plex.
We've disabled DLNA to prevent any DLNA-: Onemogućili smo DLNA da se spriječi uređaje koji imaju DLNA funkciju od pretraživanja i puštanja medija bez lozinka ili PIN-a. Ovo možete promijeniti u Vašim {1}postavkama poslužitelja{2}.
For more information on Plex Home securi: Za više informacija o Plex Home sigurnosnim postavkama, provjerite {1}Plex Home sekciju{2} na našoj stranici podrške.
You do not currently have a PIN. This wi: You do not currently have a PIN. This will allow any users in this home to switch to your account.
Plex was unable to authenticate your ser: Plex was unable to authenticate your server. Please sign your server out and try again.
Your server was unable to reach Plex. Pl: Your server was unable to reach Plex. Please ensure that the computer or device running your server can access the internet.
You have successfully signed your server: Uspješno ste prijavili svoj poslužitelj na Plex ali mu nismo u mogućnosti pristupiti izvan vaše mreže.
If you skip this step you will not be ab: If you skip this step you will not be able to share or stream media outside your home. If you change your mind later, you can adjust this in Settings.
If you would like to enable this now, yo: If you would like to enable this now, you will need to configure your router or firewall to allow Plex to contact your server. Please refer to our {1}Connecting a Server{2} article for more information.
Ova kolekcija još uvijek nema sadržaj.
Click {1}here{2} to add content to the l: Stisni {1}ovdje{2} kako bi dodao sadržaj u kolekciju.
The library is still being refreshed. Ha: Kolekcija se još uvijek osvježava. Pričekaj dok provjerimo tvoj sadržaj.
There is no content matching your active: There is no content matching your active filter.
Select which additional agents should co: Odaberite koji dodatni agenti trebaju doprinjeti za podatke {1} i povucite ih kako biste mijenjali redoslijed.
Connecting your server to Plex allows yo: Spajanje poslužitelja na Plex Vam omogućava prijenos medija izvan Vašeg doma.
Omogućite ako automatsko mapiranje ne uspije. Trebati ćete konfigurarati svoj ruter. Detaljne upute su dostupne {1}ovdje{2}.
Sets the allowed networks setting to 127: Sets the allowed networks setting to 127.0.0.1/255.255.255.255. This requires other computers on a local network to authenticate before accessing the server.
Help us translate Plex/Web into your lan: Pomozi nam prevesti Plex/Web na svoj jezik {1}ovdje{2}.
Do not prompt to select a user or enter: Do not prompt to select a user or enter a PIN during startup on this device.
Automatically play theme music in the ba: Automatski sviraj tematsku glazbu u pozadini kada je dostupna.
Prikaži neodgledane ikone u popisu stavki.
Press ? to view the list of {1}available: Pritisnite ? da bi vidjeli popis {1}dostupnih prečaca{2}.
Drag the items below to reorder your das: Povucite stavke kako bi promijenili njihov raspored na ploči.
Allow searching libraries that have been: Dopusti pretragu kolekcija koje su dijeljene s tobom.
Allow searching channels that have enabl: Dopusti pretragu kanala koje imaju omogućenu pretragu.
Use the experimental video player, which: Upotrijebi experimentalni videoplayer sa potporom strujanja za HTML5 video element umjesto Flash player. Potreban je Plex Media Server 0.9.8.6 ili više.
Allows the player to play compatible med: Allows the player to play compatible media without any conversion. In most browsers, direct play supports MP4 videos with h264 video and AAC audio. Videos with subtitles cannot be played directly.
Allows the server to copy compatible aud: Allows the server to copy compatible audio and video streams without converting them.
When multiple resolutions are available: Kada je dostupno više rezolucija za video, automatski odaberi drugu najbolju.
Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio: Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio
Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be pl: Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be played directly. Browser support for AC3 audio is limited.
Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding aud: Preferiraj AAC ispred MP3 kada pretvaraš audio. Neki uređaji poput Wii U isključivo podržavaju AAC audio.
Cinema Trailers to Play Before Movies: Foršpani će se puštati prije filmova
Let's start by giving your Plex Media Se: Krenimo sa davanjem nekog prijateljskog imena vašem Plex medijskom poslužitelju. Ako ovo ostavite prazno, koristiti ćemo ime vašeg računala.
Would you like to help us make Plex bett: Želite li nam pomoći da napravimo Plex boljim za sve? Skupljamo anonimne podatke koje koristimo za poboljšavanje usluge.
Plex channels give you access to online: Plex kanali pružaju Vam pristup online medijima sa raznolikih stranica. Možete pretraživati i instalirati te kanale iz svog Kanal Direktorija, ali krenite sa instaliranjem nekih istaknutih kanala.
See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this: Nije tako strašno, zar ne? Plex u ovom trenutku neumorno radi kako bi izgradio vašu knjižnicu i učinio ju još ljepšom.
Feel free to watch Plex work, or take th: Slobodno pratite kao Plex radi ili iskoristite priliku da {1}preuzmete{2} neke Plex aplikacije!
We really appreciate it. See what {1}ben: Puno vam hvala. Pogledajte koje {1}prednosti{2} dobivate sa svojom pretplatom.
Pređi na Premium. Uzmi Plex Pass.
Postavke nisu dozvoljene za dijeljene servere.
A problem has been detected with a core: Došlo je do problema za središnjom komponentom Plex Media Servera.
Please visit the {1}forums{2} and provid: Molimo posjetite {1}forume{2} i pripremite zapise/log-ove, kao što je opisano {3}ovdje{4}.
Sign in with a Plex account to help your: Prijavite se na Plex račun kako bi omogućili da se vaši uređaji međusobno pronađu, pristupili svojim medijima s bilo kojeg mjesta ili iz pretraživača stavili videozapise u red čekanja za naknadno gledanje na Plex-u.
Plex organizes your media into libraries: Plex organizira vašu kolekciju u sekcije, te je organizira po tipu. Možete dodati koliko god sekcija želite, a možete imati i više sekcija istoga tipa.
Molimo pričekajte trenutak do pokretanja Plex-a
Upgrade to a Plex Pass and get exclusive: Nadogradi na Plex Pass i dobivaš ekskluzivni pristup za kompletno Plex iskustvo! Fantastičnost uključuje:
Parental controls and fast switching to: Roditeljsku zaštitu i brzo prebacivanje između korisnika u tvojoj Plex mreži
Sync your media and enjoy it anywhere: Sync your media and enjoy it anywhere
Free Apps for Android, Roku, and new pla: Besplatne aplikacije za Android, Roku i nove platforme kao Xbox, Playstation i VIZIO smart TVe
Enhance your movie experience with integ: Poboljšaj svoje filmsko iskustvo sa ugrađenim foršpanima i dodatcima
To save a video to Watch Later, click \": To save a video to Watch Later, click "❯ Plex It!" in your Bookmarks Bar.
A panel will appear on the left side of: Sa lijeve strane će se pojaviti ploča koja će vam javiti da je video spremljen.
You can also recommend the video to frie: You can also recommend the video to friends or "fling" it to a Plex player and watch it there.
Send an email to the address above with: Send an email to the address above with any link(s) you want added to Watch Later.
Add this to your address book so you can: Dodajte ovo u svoj adresar kako biste mogli lako poslati poveznice sa svoga iPhonea, iPada, Androida ili bilo kojeg drugog uređaja.
Close Modal or Close Player or Navigate: Close Modal or Close Player or Navigate Back
This name will be used to identify this: Ovo ime će biti korišteno za indetifikaciju Vašeg media servera na drugim računalima na Vašoj mreži. Ako ovo ostavite prazno, koristiti ćemo ime Vašeg računala.
Send anonymous usage data to Plex: Šalji anonimne podatke o korištenju Plex-u.
This helps us improve your experience (f: Ovo nam pomaže kako bismo poboljšali Vaše iskustvo korištenja (npr., pomaže nam da bi bolje složili filmove i TV emisije).
Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging: Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging
Ask to add a login item for externally m: Ask to add a login item for externally mounted drives
Enable Plex Media Server debug logging: Enable Plex Media Server debug logging
Enable Plex Media Server token logging: Enable Plex Media Server token logging
Your library will be updated automatical: Vaša kolekcija će biti automatski ažurirana kada detektiramo promjene u mapi kolekcije
The number of recent weeks used as the w: The number of recent weeks used as the window for On Deck
Empty trash automatically after every sc: Isprazni smeće automatski nakon svakog skeniranja
Include music sections in automatic upda: Uključi glazbene sekcije u automatsko ažuriranje
Large music sections may take a long tim: Velike glazbene sekcije mogu zahtjevati duže vrijeme za skeniranje
Number of seconds to wait before a plugi: Number of seconds to wait before a plugin times out
Capability checking ensures that plug-in: Capability checking ensures that plug-ins that are incompatible with this version of the server or the current client application you are using are hidden. Disabling capability checking is useful during development, but will enable access to plug-ins that may perform unreliably with certain client applications.
List of networks that are allowed withou: Popis mreža koje su dozvoljene bez autorizacije
Comma separated list of ip/netmask for n: Zarez razdvaja popis IP-a za mreže koje su dozvoljene u PMS bez autorizacije
Enable Dolby Digital on Apple TV: Omogući Dolby Digital na Apple TV-u
When playing video on an Apple TV, allow: When playing video on an Apple TV, allow Dolby Digital audio to play. You must go to Settings on the Apple TV and set Dolby Digital Out to "On" in the Audio & Video menu.
Quality profile used by the transcoder: Quality profile used by the transcoder
Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes: Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes wait for the transcoder to begin writing data
Duration in minutes to use when transcod: Duration in minutes to use when transcoding something with an unknown duration
Directory to use when transcoding for te: Directory to use when transcoding for temporary files
Amount in seconds to buffer before throt: Amount in seconds to buffer before throttling the transcoder
Show the WebKit window used by plugins i: Show the WebKit window used by plugins instead of placing it off screen
Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS aud: Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS audio.
Media Link does not support DTS audio in: Media Link does not support DTS audio in certain regions. The Plex Media Server can automatically convert DTS to stereo so that it will play.
Automatically select audio tracks in you: Automatically select audio tracks in your preferred language when possible.
Client-specific configuration settings f: DLNA poslužiteljske postavke za određenog klijenta
Protocol info string used in GetProtocol: Protocol info string used in GetProtocolInfo responses by the DLNA server

Time at which tasks stop running.
